page.title: 10Our Garden Centre
page.content: In Kirkfieldbank there is a Garden Centre. It is called Gilchrist's Garden Centre. They have a branch in Aberdeen and one in Nairn. Old Mr.& Mrs. Gilchrist started the business when they were young. You can buy indoor plants and outdoor plants. There are pet rabbits, fish and birds. There is a pond with money thrown into the water. The money is given to charity. there is a cafeteria downstairs and a restaurant upstairs. The business has grown enormously in the last twenty years. They now have about twelve cars for delivering plants and eight or nine vans. You can buy tools for the garden , bird seed, soil and compost, souvenirs, sweets and frozen foods. They sell greenhouses and sun seats for sunny days. You can walk through the gardens. The centre is very popular.
